title: Seeing The Love
description: Previous cover edition for ASIN B00ZE9Y3C8For alternate cover edition go hereLucas Wade is losing his sight. As the darkness threatens to swamp him, the one bright spot in his day comes in the form of Natalie Fontaine. She works in the sales office, hundreds of miles away, and she alone treats him like a regular guy. She has no idea about his disability, and he doesnâ€™t plan on telling her about it. But if Lucas can't be honest with her, Natalie may never see the love he has to offer.
author: Sofia Grey
